Instruction: Preheat the grill to medium heat (around 350Â°F).
In a bowl, toss cherry tomatoes with olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic, chopped fresh thyme, salt, and black pepper.
Thread the cherry tomatoes onto skewers, leaving a little space between each tomato.
Grill the cherry tomato skewers over medium heat for about 5-7 minutes, turning occasionally, until tomatoes are slightly charred and softened.
Remove the skewers from the grill and transfer the grilled balsamic cherry tomatoes to a serving plate.
Serve the grilled balsamic cherry tomatoes as a flavorful and juicy side dish.
